ltcl: Migrate to PHP 8, Neoforge support, code refactor, bug fixes
changelog:
v2.0.0

  • Upgrade to PHP 8.3
  • Neoforge support
  • New database implementation - Added SQLite support!
  • Proper version compatility checks
  • Fixed being unable to add some Fabric mods
  • Distinction between different mod loaders.
  • Improved TOML parser (edge cases and general use)
  • Reduced disk I/O when adding/downloading mods
  • Huge amount of code refactoring
  • Reduced risk of file locking (cache.json •-•)
  • Fixed admin/user permission issues
  • Resolved SQL race conditions everywhere
  • New built-in updater - requires use of the docker image, or cloning the repository and a git executable.
  • Other bug fixes & improvements

    • Upgrade instructions
    1. Install new Technic Solder version. Either `git pull` over SSH, or re-upload the TechnicSolder folder and files; Make sure to preserve your mods, others, forges folders, as well as file functions/config.php
    2. Upgrade/switch to PHP8.3 and install and enable the PHP8.3-PDO, PHP8.3-ZIP extensions.
    3. You will then need to run /functions/upgrade1.3.5to1.4.0.php to modify your existing database.

    v1.3.4

    • Fabric support by Kio-td and ZandercraftGames
    • Support for 1.17.x+ (and more Java versions)
    • Fixes a serious issue in the authentication system
      • ATTENTION! YOU MUST MAKE CHANGES TO YOUR CONFIG AND RE-MAKE YOUR USER ACCOUNTS! (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW)
    • Cleans up the code and fixes many other bugs.
    Update by ZandercraftGames

    Special Update Instructions

    This update includes changes that will break authentication!
    If this is not a fresh install, follow these steps once you've installed the update:

    1. Update your config.php file as follows:
      1. Change the value of 'encrypted' to '0'.
      2. Set the value of 'pass' to what you want your password to be (in plain-text).
    2. Log into TechnicSolder using this password.
    3. Find the prompt asking you to encrypt your passwords and click 'Click here to proceed'.
    4. Recreate any user accounts that you've previously made.
